html:
7.29.17  6:32 pm   Are you still doing anagrams?

     are you serious, i upload a new one every day

7.29.17  5:49 pm   What does the asterisk in 3.*.09 and 8.*.09 mean?

     it means 'i don't know'
7.29.17  5:41 pm   what do you know?

7.29.17  5:35 pm   On 7.29.17  2:06 am you said you answered "probably about 19,000 questions here". But, I measured, and the number is about 21,500. How do you feel about that?

     it's too many for me to count. but someone recently said it was 19191 so i believed them

7.29.17  5:32 pm   Hey, so, are fidget spinners still popular? Or has that fad passed already? 

     i will check with the computer

7.29.17  5:10 pm   Name the top 5 greatest things of all time. Ready set go.

     everything is tied for the greatest

7.29.17  4:53 pm   What's the scariest question you get asked?

     nice try, if i say that then i will immediately get asked it a million times. i have already been asked about scary questions a million times since yesterday, after scary questions were mentioned

7.29.17  4:51 pm   I notice alot of your youtube videos dont have links to this website, why is that?

     i think most of them do

7.29.17  4:32 pm   If you could be any type of scientist, Which kind of scientist would you be? (ex. happy scientist, sad scientist, biologist, etc.)

     i am already a scientist

7.29.17  4:22 pm   resume tips?

     return to what you were doing before

7.29.17  4:00 pm   What if I think music is useless?

     then i hope you don't use it

7.29.17  3:45 pm   do you have that one creation you have made which you prefer to all your other creations for no apparent reason?

     no

7.29.17  1:22 pm   i think about stuff a lot and it feels to me that in order to move forward with the things i do, i first need to go through this massive sea of thoughts. people are telling me that i'm just complicating my life with all this thinking, and they are right, but in a way i just love to think about things. i love different points of view and the infinite amount of thoughts, but they make me super anxious too, as if something just wasn't "right". thinking helps me forward but it keeps me stuck where i am, too. what the hell. and simulationeusly something in this situation feels quite a bit "wrong". am i just a person having a stupid first world problem? have you had similar experiences?

     yes

7.29.17  12:53 pm   i think when people say make a video they mean publish/upload the video.

     i wonder where they think the video comes from

7.29.17  12:14 pm   Hi, I was reading some of the old questions on this page and found one where you were talking about using a "b7min7" to set up a "b6"... what does that mean, exactly? Would a b7min7 be like a minor triad with a major 6th (C,Eb,G,A for example).. and that's something that you think would resolve nicely to a b6 (like C,Eb,G,Ab)? Am I understanding that right?

     no. what i meant was, let's say we are in the key of C minor. use Bbminor7, (then optional Eb7) then land on Abmaj7.

7.29.17  11:43 am   What is the worst instrument?

     scientists are still trying to figure that out

7.29.17  11:20 am   do you run out of ideas easily

     no

7.29.17  11:10 am   Are you always able to get the stream of music in your head out on paper or into your music program? I could never remember the parts that went before or how it led up to the current part and I feel a lot of my good ideas get wasted. It doesn't help that I'm also bad at piano. Is there another way?

     it is very important to document new ideas immediately, otherwise you will forget. the reason you will forget is because it is brand new. you will seem to remember it perfectly in the moment, but as soon as you hear another song, the first one will be gone. you need to document new ideas immediately. nowadays there are audio recording devices everywhere, such as on smartphones, etc. just sing and/or explain how the thing goes

7.29.17  10:59 am   what are your opinions on repeating things"

     to me i think it's generally pretty straight forward. when you repeat something, it is like you have the same thing again. it is almost as if you have a copy of the thing. i'm not sure if that analogy would do it justice

7.29.17  9:37 am   do you believe in life?

     yes

7.29.17  6:46 am   if you were a different person, would you still be making this content

     i guess i will have to wait until i am a different person to find out

7.29.17  5:17 am   your favorite quote?

     hi

7.29.17  5:11 am   tell me something you can't tell to me

     ok

7.29.17  4:51 am   How do I deal with the fact that my friends don't find music to be that important? 

     that sounds more like something for them to deal with, not you

7.29.17  2:47 am   i used to think 'vaseline' was pronounced like the word 'vase' and 'line' together. is that acceptable

     sure

7.29.17  2:11 am   Do you keep the reality videos certain ways to not give to much of what your reality really is or is it just for fun.

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

7.29.17  2:06 am   Do you answer short questions in silly ways to focus on actual complex questions, or is this just normal for you?

     i have answered probably about 19,000 questions here. there are many many different types of questions and answers. i'm not sure if that answers your question

7.29.17  1:39 am   Can you do a video about whatever you want to make a video about at the moment?

     yes, although to make a video takes a bit longer than a moment

7.29.17  1:14 am   How do I make my songs more sophisticated-sounding?

     have you tried making them actually more sophisticated

7.29.17  1:12 am   if you don't like to discuss things you like,

     which is not necessarily true

     would you prefer discussing things you dislike?

     absolutely not

7.29.17  1:04 am   do you ever feel disturbed by reading all the scary existential questions here?

     i don't think those ones are the scary ones

7.29.17  12:46 am   Have you ever thought about giving each of your reality videos a name along with the date/time stamp?

     no
7.29.17  12:01 am   what is your purpose

7.28.17  11:27 pm   what percentage of your works are based on real life events(i.e not made up)?

     i am not keeping score

7.28.17  11:25 pm   How do I know if the songs I'm writing are good enough? Who decides what's good enough?

     the writer, and the listener. and if they disagree then i think it goes to the supreme court

7.28.17  11:17 pm   Is this where I can ask a question?

     yes

7.28.17  10:59 pm   You've said a few times that you want more keyboard shortcuts. Have you ever heard of the program/programming language AutoHotkey? It allows you to write your own hotkey scripts that can do just about anything on your computer including clicking in specific spots and such. Thought I'd mention it in case it helps you.

     someone suggested that before, but it is windows only

7.28.17  10:32 pm   I would like to apply to be your girlfriend, can I send my curriculum to your mail?

     sure

7.28.17  10:04 pm   When making your videos, do you usually come up with the music ideas (like the background music or "incidental music" that plays through the video, not just the jingles) at the same time you're working on the script? Or do you usually start the music side of things after coming up with the words? Btw i love the jingles, but that incidental music (or whatever you want to call it) is too good man. 

     the music you're talking about (i call it the 'score') is done at the very end, after the narration and graphics are finished. where as the jingles and sung parts are actually written in full harmonic/melodic detail along side the script, before the video is made

7.28.17  10:03 pm   have you used mspaint in some of your works?

     no

7.28.17  9:59 pm   what's one of the craziest things you've ever done?

     was born

7.28.17  9:43 pm   When does a power become a superpower?

     you will have to check with the committee of power classification

7.28.17  8:56 pm   Do you think the sun is angry that not as many people worship it anymore? 

     the sun is the reason we're here. everybody knows that

7.28.17  8:06 pm   How do you feel about A E S T H E T I C?

     i'm not sure what it is

7.28.17  7:29 pm   Can just anyone be as funny as you?

     anyone can be funny. just do stuff that's not funny and wait for people to be mad at you for not being funny. at least that's the way i do it

7.28.17  7:20 pm   where did you learn prime factorization?

     at home, and in the work place

7.28.17  7:01 pm   where do you get instrumentals for your "anything videos" like conflict, and if they're original, can you upload longer versions?

     they were made to fit the video, so they are usually not any longer than the video. also, uploading them separately would be like an invitation for people to steal them and use them in other videos, which is something people will do anyway but i hate it because i made the music specifically for a certain video

7.28.17  6:46 pm   thoughts on moist towelettes? 

     lord knows i think about them too much

7.28.17  6:45 pm   Hey i noticed "africa" one of your songs has no link to this website. Please fix 

     i don't think i have a song called africa

7.28.17  5:42 pm   how can i befriend you?

     stealth tactics
